00022 void eol_input_init()
00023 {
00024   eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_input: initializing\n");
00025   SDL_EnableKeyRepeat(SDL_DEFAULT_REPEAT_DELAY,SDL_DEFAULT_REPEAT_INTERVAL);
00026   eol_input_load_config();
00027   eol_input_keyboard_init();
00028   atexit(eol_input_close);
00029   _eol_input_initialized = eolTrue;
00030   eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_input: initialized\n");
00031 }
00032 
00033 void eol_input_close()
00034 {
00035   eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_input: closing\n");
00036   eol_input_keyboard_close();
00037   if (_eol_input_list != NULL)
00038   {
00039     free(_eol_input_list);
00040     _eol_input_list = NULL;
00041   }
00042   _eol_input_initialized = eolFalse;
00043   eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_input: closed\n");
00044 }

00051 void eol_input_update()
00052 {
00053   int i;
00054   SDLMod mod;
00055   SDL_Event event;
00056   while(SDL_PeepEvents(&event, 1, SDL_GETEVENT, SDL_ALLEVENTS));
00057   updateKeyboard();
00058   SDL_PumpEvents();
00059   mod = SDL_GetModState();
00060   for(i = 0;i < _eol_input_count;i++)
00061   {
00062     _eol_input_list[i].oldvalue = _eol_input_list[i].value;
00063     if(strcmp(_eol_input_list[i].type,"key") == 0)
00064     {
00065       _eol_input_list[i].value = _this_frame_keyboard[_eol_input_list[i].id];
00066     }
00067     else if(strcmp(_eol_input_list[i].type,"mod") == 0)
00068     {
00069       if(mod & _eol_input_list[i].id)
00070       {
00071         _eol_input_list[i].value = 1;
00072       }
00073       else _eol_input_list[i].value = 0;
00074     }
00075     /*TODO:mouse section*/
00076     /*TODO:joystick section*/
00077     if(_eol_input_list[i].value == 1)
00078     {
00079       _eol_input_list[i].lastPress = _eol_input_list[i].timePress;
00080       _eol_input_list[i].timePress = SDL_GetTicks();
00081     }
00082   }
00083 }

00085 eolInt eol_input_parse(char *type, char *input)
00086 {
00087   int i;
00088   if((type == NULL)||(input == NULL))return -1;
00089   if(strcmp(type,"key")==0)
00090   {
00091     if(input[0] == 'F')
00092     {
00093       sscanf(input,"F%i",&i);
00094       i--;
00095       return SDLK_F1 + i;
00096     }
00097     if((input[0] >= 'a')&&(input[0] <= 'z'))
00098     {
00099       return input[0]-'a' + SDLK_a;
00100     }
00101     if((input[0] >= '0')&&(input[0] <= '9'))
00102     {
00103       return input[0]-'0' + SDLK_0;
00104     }
00105     if(input[0] == '/')return SDLK_SLASH;
00106     if(input[0] == '\\')return SDLK_BACKSLASH;
00107     if(input[0] == '[')return SDLK_LEFTBRACKET;
00108     if(input[0] == ']')return SDLK_RIGHTBRACKET;
00109     if(input[0] == '-')return SDLK_MINUS;
00110     if(input[0] == '=')return SDLK_EQUALS;
00111     if(input[0] == '`')return SDLK_CARET;
00112     if(input[0] == ',')return SDLK_COMMA;
00113     if(input[0] == ';')return SDLK_SEMICOLON;
00114     if(input[0] == ':')return SDLK_COLON;
00115     if(input[0] == '.')return SDLK_PERIOD;
00116     if(strcmp(input,"TAB")==0)return SDLK_TAB;
00117     if(strcmp(input,"ESC")==0)return SDLK_ESCAPE;
00118     if(strcmp(input,"ENTER")==0)return SDLK_RETURN;
00119     if(strcmp(input,"SPACE")==0)return SDLK_SPACE;
00120     if(strcmp(input,"UPARROW")==0)return SDLK_UP;
00121     if(strcmp(input,"DOWNARROW")==0)return SDLK_DOWN;
00122     if(strcmp(input,"LEFTARROW")==0)return SDLK_LEFT;
00123     if(strcmp(input,"RIGHTARROW")==0)return SDLK_RIGHT;
00124     if(strcmp(input,"BACKSPACE")==0)return SDLK_BACKSPACE;
00125   }
00126   if(strcmp(type,"mod")==0)
00127   {
00128     if(strcmp(input,"LShift")==0)
00129     {
00130       return KMOD_LSHIFT;
00131     }
00132     if(strcmp(input,"RShift")==0)
00133     {
00134       return KMOD_RSHIFT;
00135     }
00136     if(strcmp(input,"LCtrl")==0)
00137     {
00138       return KMOD_LCTRL;
00139     }
00140     if(strcmp(input,"RCtrl")==0)
00141     {
00142       return KMOD_RCTRL;
00143     }
00144     if(strcmp(input,"LAlt")==0)
00145     {
00146       return KMOD_LALT;
00147     }
00148     if(strcmp(input,"RAlt")==0)
00149     {
00150       return KMOD_RALT;
00151     }
00152   }
00153   if(strcmp(type,"button")==0)
00154   {
00155     sscanf(input,"%i",&i);
00156     return i;
00157   }
00158   if(strcmp(type,"+axis")==0)
00159   {
00160     sscanf(input,"%i",&i);
00161     return i;
00162   }
00163   if(strcmp(type,"-axis")==0)
00164   {
00165     sscanf(input,"%i",&i);
00166     return i;
00167   }
00168   return -1;
00169 }

00171 void eol_input_add_input_from_link(eolKeychain *link,eolUint i)
00172 {
00173   eolLine temp;
00174   if (i >= _eol_input_count)return;
00175   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(_eol_input_list[i].name,link,"name");
00176   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(temp,link,"type");
00177   eol_word_cpy(_eol_input_list[i].type,temp);
00178   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(temp,link,"id");
00179   _eol_input_list[i].id = eol_input_parse(_eol_input_list[i].type, temp);
00180 }

00182 void eol_input_load_config()
00183 {
00184   int i;
00185   eolKeychain *chain;
00186   eolConfig *conf;
00187   eolUint count;
00188   conf = eol_config_load("system/controls.cfg");
00189   if (conf == NULL)
00190   {
00191     eol_logger_message(
00192       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00193       "eol_input:failed to load control configuration\n");
00194     return;
00195   }
00196   if (!eol_config_get_keychain_by_tag(&chain,conf,"primary"))
00197   {
00198     eol_logger_message(
00199       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00200       "eol_input:no primary inputs in config\n");
00201     eol_config_free(&conf);
00202     return;
00203   }
00204   count = eol_keychain_get_list_count(chain);
00205   /*TODO: support secondary input methods*/
00206   _eol_input_count = count;
00207   _eol_input_list = (eolInput *)malloc(sizeof(eolInput) * count);
00208   if (_eol_input_list == NULL)
00209   {
00210     eol_logger_message(
00211       EOL_LOG_FATAL,
00212       "eol_input:failed to allocate input list\n");
00213     eol_config_free(&conf);
00214     return;
00215   }
00216   memset(_eol_input_list,0,sizeof(eolInput) * count);
00217   for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
00218   {
00219     eol_input_add_input_from_link(eol_keychain_get_list_nth(chain, i),i);
00220   }
00221   eol_config_free(&conf);
00222 }

00224 void eol_input_keyboard_close()
00225 {
00226   if (_last_frame_keyboard != NULL)free(_last_frame_keyboard);
00227 }
00228 
00229 void eol_input_keyboard_init()
00230 {
00231   _this_frame_keyboard = SDL_GetKeyState(&_eol_input_keyboard_numkeys);
00232   _last_frame_keyboard = (Uint8 *)malloc(sizeof(Uint8)*_eol_input_keyboard_numkeys);
00233   memcpy(
00234       _last_frame_keyboard,
00235       _this_frame_keyboard,
00236       sizeof(Uint8)*_eol_input_keyboard_numkeys
00237       );
00238       if(_last_frame_keyboard == NULL)
00239   {
00240     eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_ERROR,"eol_input: unable to initialize keyboard structure!\n");
00241   }
00242 }
00243 
00244 void updateKeyboard()
00245 {
00246   int i;
00247   if((!_eol_input_initialized) ||
00248      (_last_frame_keyboard == NULL) ||
00249      (_this_frame_keyboard == NULL))return;
00250   for (i = 0; i < _eol_input_keyboard_numkeys;i++)
00251   {
00252     _last_frame_keyboard[i] = _this_frame_keyboard[i];
00253   }
00254   _last_frame_keyboard_mod = _this_frame_keyboard_mod;
00255   _this_frame_keyboard_mod = SDL_GetModState();
00256 }
00257 
00258 void eol_input_clear_keyboard()
00259 {
00260   if((!_eol_input_initialized) ||
00261      (_last_frame_keyboard == NULL))return;
00262   memset(_last_frame_keyboard,0,sizeof(Uint8)*_eol_input_keyboard_numkeys);
00263   _last_frame_keyboard_mod = 0;
00264   _this_frame_keyboard_mod = 0;
00265 }

00267 eolBool eol_input_is_key_pressed(eolInt key)
00268 {
00269   if((!_eol_input_initialized) ||
00270     (_last_frame_keyboard == NULL) ||
00271     (_this_frame_keyboard == NULL))
00272   {
00273     eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_ERROR,"eol_input: uninitialized.");
00274     return 0;
00275   }
00276   if ((key < 0) || (key >= _eol_input_keyboard_numkeys))
00277   {
00278     eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_ERROR,"eol_input: key out of range\n");
00279     return 0;
00280   }
00281   if ((_last_frame_keyboard[key] == 0) &&
00282       (_this_frame_keyboard[key] == 1))
00283     return eolTrue;
00284   return eolFalse;
00285 }
00286 
00287 eolBool eol_input_is_key_released(eolInt key)
00288 {
00289   if((_eol_input_initialized == eolFalse) ||
00290     (_last_frame_keyboard == NULL) ||
00291     (_this_frame_keyboard == NULL))
00292   {
00293     eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_ERROR,"eol_input: uninitialized.\n");
00294     return 0;
00295   }
00296   if ((key < 0) || (key >= _eol_input_keyboard_numkeys))
00297   {
00298     eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_ERROR,"eol_input: key out of range\n");
00299     return 0;
00300   }
00301   if ((_last_frame_keyboard[key] == 1) &&
00302     (_this_frame_keyboard[key] == 0))
00303     return eolTrue;
00304   return eolFalse;
00305 }

00314     return 0;

00317   {
00318     eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_ERROR,"eol_input: key out of range\n");
00319     return 0;
00320   }
00321   if ((_last_frame_keyboard[key] == 1) &&
00322     (_this_frame_keyboard[key] == 1))

00324     return eolTrue;

00362 eolBool eol_input_is_mod_pressed(eolUint mod)
00363 {
00364   if((_eol_input_initialized == eolFalse) ||
00365     (_last_frame_keyboard == NULL) ||
00366     (_this_frame_keyboard == NULL))
00367   {
00368     eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_ERROR,"eol_input: uninitialized.");
00369     return 0;

00371   if ((_this_frame_keyboard_mod & mod) &&
00372     (!(_last_frame_keyboard_mod & mod)))
00373   {
00374     return eolTrue;
00375   }
00376   return eolFalse;
00377 }

00396 eolBool eol_input_quit_check()
00397 {
00398   SDL_Event event;
00399   while(SDL_PeepEvents(&event, 1, SDL_PEEKEVENT, SDL_QUITMASK))
00400   {
00401     if(event.type == SDL_QUIT)
00402     {
00403       return eolTrue;
00404     }
00405   }
00406   return eolFalse;
00407 }

00409 eolInput *eol_input_get_by_name(char *input)
00410 {
00411   int i;
00412   for (i = 0;i < _eol_input_count;i++)
00413   {
00414     if (strncmp(input,_eol_input_list[i].name,EOLLINELEN) == 0)
00415     {
00416       return &_eol_input_list[i];
00417     }
00418   }
00419   eol_logger_message(
00420     EOL_LOG_WARN,
00421     "eol_input:failed to find input %s\n",
00422     input);
00423   return NULL;
00424 }

00426 eolFloat eol_input_is_input_down(char *inputName)
00427 {
00428   eolInput *input = NULL;
00429   input = eol_input_get_by_name(inputName);
00430   if (input == NULL)return 0;
00431   if (input->value != 0)return input->value;
00432   return 0;
00433 }

00435 eolBool eol_input_is_input_pressed(char *inputName)
00436 {
00437   eolInput *input = NULL;
00438   input = eol_input_get_by_name(inputName);
00439   if (input == NULL)return eolFalse;
00440   if ((input->value == 0) && (input->oldvalue != 0))return eolTrue;
00441   return eolFalse;
00442 }

00448   if (input == NULL)return eolFalse;
00449   if ((input->value != 0) && (input->oldvalue == 0))return eolTrue;

00453 eolFloat eol_input_is_input_held(char *inputName)

00456   input = eol_input_get_by_name(inputName);
00457   if (input == NULL)return 0;
